front.title: Considerations for Assigning a new Recommended DiffServ Codepoint (DSCP)

abstract.t: This document discusses considerations for assigning a new recommended DiffServ Code Point (DSCP) for a new standard Per Hop Behavior (PHB). It considers the common observed remarking behaviors that the DiffServ field might be subjected to along an Internet path. It also notes some implications of using a specific DSCP.
